articles.description: Samsung's upcoming Galaxy A06 has had its design and specifications leaked by a tipster, revealing details about its display, camera setup, and other features. A support page for the handset has also appeared on Samsung's Indian website, hinting at an imminen…
articles.content: Samsung is gearing up to launch the Galaxy A06, with numerous details of the upcoming entry-level smartphone leaked by tipster Steve Hemmerstoffer (@OnLeaks) in collaboration with GizNext. The leaked… [+2684 chars]
